mapper.update: update mate_board set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select B.*from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select*from mate_board order by num desc)A)B where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select B.*from (select rownum rn, A.* from (select*from mate_board where
(#{tag} like '%${word}%') and
(mtravel_date_s between #{mtravel_date_s} and #{mtravel_date_e}) and (mtravel_date_e between #{mtravel_date_s} and #{mtravel_date_e}) and
( mthema like '%${mthema0}%' or mthema like '%${mthema1}%' or mthema like '%${mthema2}%' or mthema like '%${mthema3}%') and
( mroom like '%${mroom0}%' or mroom like '%${mroom1}%' or mroom='상관없음') and
(price1 between #{price1} and #{price2}) and (price2 between #{price1} and #{price2}) or (price1=0 and price2=0) and
( mgender like '%${mgender0}%' or mgender like '%${mgender1}%' or mgender='상관없음') and
( mage like '%$mage0}%' or mage like '%${mage1}%' or mage like '%${mage2}%' or mage like '%${mage3}%' or mage like '%${mage4}%') )A)B
where rn between #{start} and #{end} order by num desc
